ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] grouping thread on the Everquest boards
ygData.msgSnippet: ... With 4 tanks you could be singing: Psalm of Warmth Chant of Battle Fufils which would give a damage shield, AC, Dex, Str, DoT and lower the mobs resist all
ygData.messageBody:
> 30th. A good example is last nite. I was grouped with an
> enchanter and the
> spells I was twisting was Fulfil's, Hymn, and Guardian.


With 4 tanks you could be singing:

Psalm of Warmth
Chant of Battle
Fufils

which would give a damage shield, AC, Dex, Str, DoT and lower the mobs
resist all while wailing away on the front line. Sounds pretty useful to me!

hitting 32 will change a LOT, but still, there is a lot you can add to a
group before then.


Tszaaz


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
